original_title: Do I Take The Bunny With Me?
overview: 'I've got no more use of my arms, or my legs, or my hands, but I'm doing just fine with art...'. As his challenge with ALS becomes greater, his art and message become stronger. 'Do I Take The Bunny With Me?' is the amazingly inspirational story of how Jim Kimberly creates a language through art to communicate the courage within us all.
title: Do I Take The Bunny With Me?
